issue_title: [Feature] Add equality comparison (__eq__) for Todo objects

verification.ruff_command: uv run ruff check src/flywheel/todo.py tests/test_issue_4440_todo_equality.py

lint_fixes.fix: Changed 'assert todo != None' to 'assert todo is not None' (E711)

implementation_details: Added __eq__ method that compares Todo objects by id (entity semantics). Two Todo objects are equal if they have the same id, regardless of other fields. Returns NotImplemented for non-Todo types to allow proper comparison protocol.
